Package model

package model
Contains all domain model classes representing core business entities.

This package defines the data structures and business entities for the Internship Placement System:

  • User - Abstract base class for all user types
  • Student - Student user with major and GPA attributes
  • Staff - Staff user managing internship approvals
  • CompanyRepresentative - Company representative managing internships
  • Internship - Internship posting with requirements and status
  • Application - Student application for internship
  • UserRegistry - Singleton registry managing all users

User hierarchy: 

 User (abstract)
  ├── Student
  ├── Staff
  └── CompanyRepresentative

Design features:

  • Immutable IDs: User and entity IDs cannot be changed after creation
  • Validation: All setters validate input using ValidationHelper
  • State Management: Status transitions controlled by enums
  • Persistence: CSV-compatible with automatic saving

Entity relationships:

  • Student → Application (1:N) - A student can have multiple applications
  • Internship → Application (1:N) - An internship can have multiple applications
  • CompanyRepresentative → Internship (1:N) - A company rep manages multiple internships
Since:
2025-11-16
Version:
1.0
Author:
NTU SC2002 Group
  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    Application
    Represents a student application for an internship.
    CompanyRepresentative
    Represents a company representative who can create and manage internship opportunities.
    Internship
    Represents an internship opportunity in the system.
    Staff
    Represents a staff member who manages the internship system.
    Student
    Represents a student user who can apply for internships.
    User
    Abstract base class representing a user in the Internship Placement System.
    UserRegistry
    Central database for all users in the system.
